# preventsAutomaticBackgroundingDuringVideoPlayback

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether video playback prevents the system from automatically backgrounding an app.

## Declaration

```swift
var preventsAutomaticBackgroundingDuringVideoPlayback: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], which indicates the system doesn’t automatically background an app while playing video. The value of this property doesn’t prevent the user from backgrounding an app.



## Preventing backgrounding

- **preventsDisplaySleepDuringVideoPlayback**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the layer prevents the system from sleeping during video playback.
